nodes.documentation: Ensures that the consumer has enough ballance
nodes.name: _hasBallance

nodes.documentation:
Creates an instance of the consumer contract.
The Supplier contract addres must be informed.
nodes.name: Consumer

nodes.documentation: Displays the supplier for this contract
nodes.name: getSupplierAddress

nodes.documentation:
*
Informs the consumer power. If  the storage level is empty
the user must consume from the grid, otherwise 
the system will debit razors from the user account.
nodes.name: consume
